StSShapeShifter:BurstingSpore.NAME: Bursting Spore
StSShapeShifter:BurstingSpore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !B! Block. NL [#32CD32] Grow[] !M!

StSShapeShifter:FesteringBite.NAME: Festering Bite
StSShapeShifter:FesteringBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Weak. NL [#32CD32] Grow[] 1

StSShapeShifter:DeepWound.NAME: Deep Wound
StSShapeShifter:DeepWound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Whenever the target attacks, they take !M! damage.

StSShapeShifter:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting Strike
StSShapeShifter:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you changed forms this turn, this card costs 0.

StSShapeShifter:Guard.NAME: Guard
StSShapeShifter:Guard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card !M! times.

StSShapeShifter:Sapling.NAME: Sapling
StSShapeShifter:Sapling.DESCRIPTION: Swap this card with a card in your discard pile. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:Hunt.NAME: Hunt
StSShapeShifter:Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain 2 energy next turn.

StSShapeShifter:LeapingSlash.NAME: Leaping Slash
StSShapeShifter:LeapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 2 Dexterity. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:OpportuneSwoop.NAME: Opportune Swoop
StSShapeShifter:OpportuneSwoop.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 5 cards in you Draw Pile and Discard Pile. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:Bonk.NAME: Bonk
StSShapeShifter:Bonk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Enter a random form.

StSShapeShifter:ThrashAbout.NAME: Thrash About
StSShapeShifter:ThrashAbout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies 3 times. Lose 1 energy next turn.

StSShapeShifter:CursedApple.NAME: Cursed Apple
StSShapeShifter:CursedApple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Wither !M!. If this card is withered to 0, add a random Curse into your deck and exhaust this card.

StSShapeShifter:MultiSpiritedStrike.NAME: Multi-Spirited Strike
StSShapeShifter:MultiSpiritedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is equivalent to !M!X the number of unique forms played this combat.

StSShapeShifter:Tortoise_Form.NAME: Tortoise Form
StSShapeShifter:Tortoise_Form.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Tortoise Form, Gain !B!. While in Tortoise Form, gain !M! Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:Lynx_Form.NAME: Lynx_Form
StSShapeShifter:Lynx_Form.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Lynx Form, Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. While in Lynx Form, gain !M! Strength

StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.NAME: Deer Form
StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Deer Form, Gain !M! Weak and Draw 1 card. While in Deer Form, add a random skill to your hand at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:BearForm.NAME: Bear Form
StSShapeShifter:BearForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Bear Form, Gain !M! Shielding and 1 Dexterity. While in Bear Form, gain 2(3) Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:DragonForm.NAME: Dragon Form
StSShapeShifter:DragonForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Dragon Form, Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. While in Dragon Form, deal 6(8) to all enemies and gain 6(8) block. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:HydraForm.NAME: Hydra Form
StSShapeShifter:HydraForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hydra Form, Lose !M! Strength. While in Hydra Form, deal triple damage. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:Rest.NAME: Rest
StSShapeShifter:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Exit your form. You may not enter a new form this turn. Gain !B! Block.

StSShapeShifter:Sap_Burst.NAME: Sap Burst
StSShapeShifter:Sap_Burst.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, reduce a random enemy's strength by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpirit.NAME: Diverse Spirit
StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
StSShapeShifter:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
StSShapeShifter:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !StSShapeShifter:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

StSShapeShifter:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
StSShapeShifter:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
